芒.definition: awn (of cereals); arista (of grain); tip (of a blade); Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass); variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan

芒刺在背.definition: feeling brambles and thorns in one's back (idiom); uneasy and nervous; to be on pins and needles

芒種.definition: Mangzhong or Grain in Beard, 9th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th June
